tweet.text: Is your interest in history rivaled only by your grammatical prowess? Do you delight in em and en dashes? Apply to the Presidential Management Fellows Program to work in Editing and Publishing at @HistoryAtState. #PMF applications accepted until Oct. 12: https://t.co/9MdLicfclR https://t.co/orXRyk6hP0
tweet.html: Is your interest in history rivaled only by your grammatical prowess? Do you delight in em and en dashes? Apply to the Presidential Management Fellows Program to work in Editing and Publishing at @HistoryAtState. #PMF applications accepted until Oct. 12: bit.ly/OH-PMF
